name: Rob the bank
description:
You’re on a mission to rob bank, however this is no ordinary bank they have the most advance security system installed. two access that vault you will need to collect the 6 key cards each having a unique challenge to acquire.

Run through an endless corridor of lasers, fall from ridiculous heights, crawl though a maze of vents, platform over a bottomless pit and more to achieve you goal

Enjoy in both VR and desktop with controller support
